channel.title: KHOA on ASML-YONSEI
channel.description: Recent content in KHOA on ASML-YONSEI

item.title: Workshop at KHOA
item.description: Korea Hydrographic and Oceanographic Agency Hajoon attended the workshop on the future plan to utilize the observation from Ocean Research Stations around the Korean Peninsula. He presented how valuable biogeochemical measurements from these sites for the estimation of the biogeochemical ocean states using data assimilation.
